original_title: Landslide early warnings issued for 09 districts
original_body_lines: The National Building and Research Organisation (NBRO), on Sunday (Dec. 10) issued early landslide warnings for several localities in nine districts, to be in effect until 03.30 p.m. tomorrow (Dec. 11).
Accordingly, a Level 02 (Amber) alert was issued for the following areas:
Badulla - Hali Ela Divisional Secretariat Division (DSD) and surrounding areas
Kandy - Yatinuwara, Thumpane and Pasbage Korale DSDs and surrounding areas
Meanwhile, Level 01 (Yellow) alerts have been issued for the following areas:
Badulla - Passara, Ella and Haldummulla DSDs and surrounding areas
Kandy - Pathadumbara, Ududumbara, Udapalatha, Medadumbara and Gangawata Korale DSDs and surrounding areas
Kurunegala - Mawathagama, Rideegama and Polgahawela DSDs and surrounding areas
Matale - Ukuwela, Ambanganga Korale, Laggala Pallegama and Naula DSDs and surrounding areas
Nuwara Eliya - Ambagamuwa, Walapane and Hanguranketha DSDs and surrounding areas
Ratnapura - Weligepola, Opanayake, Elapatha, Kalawana and Kuruwita DSDs and surrounding areas
